CareRequestExtension.name: CareRequestExtension
CareRequestExtension.description: Represents extra details for a care request such as the subscriber details for the member's health plan, home healthcare status, and ambulance transportation details.

AppealEffectuationDateTime.description: The effective date of the outcome of the appeal request. For example, if a claim was successfully appealed, this field displays the date when the claim was paid.

AuthorizationRefIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the authorization request.

CareRequestCaseId.description: Case related to the care request extension.

CareRequestId.description: Care request related to the care request extension.

CaseSubStatus.description: The substatus of a case related to a care request.

ClientSourceSysIdentifier.description: An identifier of the client's source system that sent the care request.

CoveragePlanTypeId.description: Specifies the type of plan the member is covered by.

DocumentAttachmentStatus.description: The status of a clinical document upload.

HealthcareProviderId.description: The healthcare provider associated with the care request against whom the Grievance is filed

HomeHealthCertificationEndDate.description: Certification end date for home healthcare.

HomeHealthCertificationStartDate.description: Certification start date for home healthcare.

HomeHealthStartDate.description: Date that home health services are scheduled or anticipated to start.

IndependentReviewDetermination.description: The determination made by the independent review.

IndependentReviewDeterminationDate.description: The date when the determination was made by the independent review.

IndependentReviewSubmissionDate.description: The date when the review request was submitted for independent review.

IsIndependentReviewRequired.description: Indicates whether an independent review is required

IsMedicareCoverage.description: Indicates whether the member has Medicare coverage.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Name of the care request extension.

NursingHomeResidentialStatus.description: Nursing home-resident status at the time of service.

PriorDischargeStatus.description: Specifies the previous discharge status of the member.

ReferenceCaseType.description: Specifies the type of reference case that's associated with the care request extension.

ReopenDecisionDateTime.description: The date when the decision on the reopen request was made.

ReopenRequestOutcome.description: The result of the reopen request.

RequestExtensionReason.description: The reason for requesting the care extension.

RequestExtnDecisionDateTime.description: The date when the decision to extend the care request extension was made.

RequestOutcome.description: Specifies the outcome of the request.

RequestOutcomeDesc.description: The description of the request outcome.

RequestingProviderId.description: The provider who requested a prior authorization for a care request. This field is available in API version 55.0 and later.

ResolutionDescription.description: The description of the care request.

ServiceType.description: Classification of the type of service.

ServicingFacilityId.description: The facility where a patient receives service for a care request. This field is available in API version 55.0 and later.

ServicingProviderId.description: The provider who provides the service for a care request. This field is available in API version 55.0 and later.

SubscriberId.description: Identifier for the person who has subscribed to the health plan.

SupportingDocUrl.description: The URL of supporting documentation such as a questionnaire.

TotalAmbulanceTransportDistance.description: Total distance traveled during ambulance transport.

UnitofMeasureId.description: The unit of measure for the quantity associated with a prior authorization request. This field is available in API version 55.0 and later.
